verses.roman:
eteṣām api rājendra
tanu-jānāṁ madhu-dviṣaḥ
pradyumna āsīt prathamaḥ
pitṛ-vad rukmiṇī-sutaḥ

synonyms: eteṣām—of these; api—and; rāja-indra—O most eminent of kings; madhu-dviṣaḥ—of Kṛṣṇa, enemy of the demon Madhu; pradyumnaḥ—Pradyumna; āsīt—was; prathamaḥ—first; rukmiṇī-sutaḥ—son of Rukmiṇī.
translation: O best of kings, of these sons begotten by Lord Kṛṣṇa, the enemy of Madhu, the most prominent was Rukmiṇī's son Pradyumna. He was just like His father.
